meanings.definition: A traditional Indian bed made of a wooden frame with woven ropes or fabric for support.
meanings.sent1: The charpai in the corner of the room looked inviting for a nap.
meanings.sent2: She sat on the charpai and read her favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the charpai was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The charpai held memories of laughter and stories shared under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the charpai caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To sleep or rest on a charpai.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, he charpai-ed under the shade of the tree.
meanings.sent2: They often charpai by the fire during camping trips.
meanings.sent3: She charpai-ed so peacefully that she didn't hear the birds chirping around her.
meanings.sent4: In his dreams, he charpai-ed on clouds made of cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The tired travelers charpai-ed in the cozy inn, grateful for a soft bed.
